bio: Badr El Houari “Moroccan java evangelist and Jboss tools lover” is a technical expert and senior Java developer with about 7 years of experience developing and building Java and Java EE application. Badr has co-founded the MoroccoJUG (Morocco Java User Group www.moroccojug.org ) in 2009 which actually the only active JUG in Morocco.  Badr is a frequent speaker in local events at engineering schools and universities, he is trying with MoroccoJUG co-workers to provide a platform for all Java enthusiasts to network, exchange ideas, share knowledge and help each other in order to strengthen the Java community in Morocco.  He is a member of the JCP.
name: Badr El Houari
